Honour/Award Title: Fellowship Award of the Institute of Governance and Social Research
Reason for Award: In recognition of his contribution to the liberation of his country, the establishment of Democratic foundation, peace and Political stability in Namibia, and the enhancement of the dignity of the Black Man
Awarding Body: Institute of Governance and Social Research, Nigeria

Honour/Award Title: Companion of the Order of the Star of Ghana (Ghana National Highest Award)
Reason for Award: As an expression of respect and admiration of the Government and people of Ghana

Honour/Award Title: Founding President of the Republic of Namibia and Father of the Namibian Nation
Reason for Award: In recognition of his dedication to his selfless sacrifice to the national liberation struggle and nation building

Awarding Body: Cheetah Conservation Fund (Nujoma is the international patron of this organisation since 1991)

Honour/Award Title: International KIM IL Sung Prize Certificate
